title: Gameplan: The Language & Strategy of Pro Football
brief_description: John Riggins of the Washington Redskins and Los Angeles Raiders head coach, Tom Flores explain some of the mysteries of gridiron. Part one looks at terminology, skills and strategy and part two profiles each NFL team taking a detailed look at some of their signature plays.
